title: Boots Immune Defence Advanced Support | 30 Tablets
description: Our all-in-one immune health supplements are packed with 24 micronutrients to support cell protection and normal function of the immune system.
cleaned_text: Advanced Support 24 Micronutrients 30 Tablets In order to buy non-prescription medicines you must be a registered user of our site as we are obliged to record your transaction history. We also ask that you complete our questionnaire so our pharmacy team can check that this product is suitable for you to buy. Disabled or chronically sick people can claim VAT relief on purchases for personal or domestic use that are applicable to their disability or sickness. Collect 18 points with this purchase Check store stock overlay Please use this overlay to check for product availability [ Product details ](javascript:void(0)) Multivitamin and Mineral Food Supplement with Cysteine, Carnitine and Citrus Bioflavonoids, 30 tablets What does it do? At Boots we understand how important your overall health + vitality is for you to be at your best and with a busy lifestyle you can't afford to be under the weather. With that in mind, Immune Defence is packed with 24 micronutrients expertly formulated to be an all-in-one proactive immune health supplement. Vitamins D3 and C, and minerals Selenium and Zinc all contribute to the normal function of the immune system whilst Vitamins C, E and minerals Selenium and Zinc, protect cells from oxidative stress. Free from Artificial Flavours and Preservatives. Lactose Free. Suitable for vegetarians. Suitable for Suitable for adults and children aged 12 years and over. How to use Take one tablet a day with plenty of liquid. Do not exceed the daily dose. Hazards and Cautions Food supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be substituted for a varied diet or healthy lifestyle. While every care has been taken to ensure this information is always as accurate as possible, food products are regularly improved and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result we recommend that you always read the label carefully before using or consuming any products. Nutritional Reference Value (NRV) information is based on the typical composition of the product. Guideline daily amounts are those for a typical adult (men and women). NRV information for non Boots products is calculated by the manufacturer. Boots has no control over the recipe or nutritional content of such products and information on this site may differ to that given on the product label. We would therefore recommend you do not solely rely on this information and always read the product label. If you have any queries, or you would like advice on Boots products please contact our friendly Customer care team on 0345 609 0055. This information was last updated 23/10/2019. Not suitable for children under 12 years. Before taking this product, please consult your doctor or pharmacist if you are taking any medication, or are pregnant, breastfeeding, trying to become pregnant. Not to be taken by smokers. Warning: Do not use if foil is broken. Contains Vitamin A Contains: Iron. Keep out of sight and reach of children. In case of overdose seek medical attention. Storage Store in a cool, dry place For Best Before End Date, see the base of carton. Keep out of sight and reach of children Important info Address: The Boots Company PLC Nottingham England NG2 3AA Ingredients Cellulose, Ascorbic Acid, Calcium Carbonate, Magnesium Oxide, Carnitine Tartrate, Modified Maize Starch, Vitamin E Zinc Oxide, Riboflavin, Manganese Sulphate, Antioxidants (Cholecalciferol).
